job.title: Machine Learning Engineer - Remote
job.description: pstrongMachine Learning EngineerstrongppbrppWe are extremely excited to be working with a rapidly growing truly innovative data analytics technology developer who have grown from a team of four to over one hundred employees in five yearsppbrppThey are continuing their expansion on the back of a number of successful projects and securing major global partnership and are looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to help drive the companys capabilities forwardppbrppThis is a truly amazing opportunity for a Machine Learning Engineer to join an organisation that is destined for great thingsppbrppstrongAs the selected Machine Learning Engineer your skills and experience should includestrongppstrongspan classqlcursorspanstrongpulliIndustry experience developing machine and deep learning algorithmsliliA strong understanding of the auxiliary practical concerns in production machine learning systemsliliSolid programming skills in languages such as Python CCliliExperience with deep learning frameworks eg Pytorch TensorFlow Kubeflow etcliliProven experience of endtoend full software development life cycle and best practicenbspmethodologies including but not limited to Agile methodologies Scrum Kanban etc building amp maintaining CICD pipelines eg Github actionsliliIdeally some experience or knowledge of cloud services data pipelines andor distributed ML egusing docker Kubernetes etcliulpbrppPlease note even if you dont have exactly the background indicated do contact us now if this type of job is of interest  we may well have similar opportunities that you would be suited to And of course we always get your permission before submitting your CV to a companyp
